name: PlushMine Adventure
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure in Plushmine Adventure as you search for the lost Plushie, who desperately cries out for help. But be cautious, as you delve deep into the dark and mysterious depths of The Mine, you may discover that not all is as it seems, as the duality of the creatures . Unravel the truth and bring Plushie to safety!

Controls:

WASD - Move around
Left Click - Interact with any other items

Art Creation - (Lead) Bunny, TheBigChunkus, DizzyAngeles 
Designer - (Lead) TheBigChunkus
Programmers - (Lead) DiamondGelato, TheBigChunkus 
Sound  - (Lead) DizzyAngeles
